Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
27.12.2011 GB SCR16990 Extended list of parameters if the BCM002 is calls
19.09.2011 JH SCR16731 BAD700D Added call BAD702 for type 2,4,6 (Change)
11.07.2011 SH SCR16588 BAD700B Changed condition to call BCM002, now if
CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT (new) - CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTCLNT (old) <> 0
02.05.2011 SH SCR16387 BAD700F Replaced BPH122 by GB902
27.04.2011 JOH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
01.02.2011 GB SCR16182 Extended list of parameters in the call BAD013
09.06.2009 SH SCR14677 Removed test 'LCHD_AMOUNTLCA > 0' to perform BAD700B
23.04.2008 SH SCR13566 Added BCM002.PI.VALUEDATE = null
14.01.2008 SH SCR13280 BAD700D Extended test to call 2. BAD702 with
(LCHI_AMOUNTLC <> 0 or LCHI_DATEEXPIRYLC <> null)
22.08.2007 SH SCR12833 BAD700C Added call BAD724 if LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 90
30.03.2007 SH SCR12407 BAD700 Changed update on CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTDEPO
23.03.2007 SH SCR12340 Added test on LCHI_BAD700UPDATESPERFORMED = N
to perform database updates and set to Y to lock the current LCHI row
19.03.2007 SH SCR12375 Extended test to perform BAD700C; BAD700E Added
test on LCHI_TRANSIT = 'N' to perform updates on LCHD sold amounts
06.03.2007 SH SCR12353 Replaced BAD700C with call of BAD724;
BAD700EChanged update of LCHD_AMOUNTLC_PRE / NOTSOLDA fields
08.01.2007 SH SCR12216 BAD700B Added test on LCHD_AMOUNTLCA > 0 to perform modul
15.12.2006 SH SCR12174 Added test on LCHI_SETTLEMENTOFCOSTS = 0 or 1 to
perform BAD700D - ChargeCosts
30.11.2006 SH SCR12118 Changed seuquence of BAD700D / E and renamed modules acc.
BAD700B / D (new): Added LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 6 handling
20.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changes in BAD700B acc. to "LC remarks 21"
19.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changes in BAD700B / E acc. to "LC remarks 20"
12.10.2006 SH SCR11983 BAD700F Changed currency handling
04.10.2006 SH SCR11403 Changed BAD700B/D/F
02.10.2006 JJ SCR 11963 BAD700F Now using LCHI_VALUEDATE
-ADML_TYPE 116 replaced by type 117
22.09.2006 SH SCR11403 BAD700F Added BPH122 to calc BAD013:PI.AMOUNT
22.09.2006 SH SCR11944 BAD700E Changed arguments for BAD702 in case of
changes if LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 2,3,4,5 (change)
-- Database fileds
-- Perform all database updates in one single transaction
-- First check if BAD700 was not already performed for the current LCHI row and
if FALSE lock the current LCHI row to prevent multiple processing of the same
row
-- Only if lock (update) on LCHI was successful, go on wth further updates
... use value of LCHD_CDEP_DEPNO before BAD700A was performed
-- BAD700C - Stock changes
... BCM002 perform updates in the other tables
-- '36004367' is the ING ID, at the moment hardcoded
-- Variable uses to call BCM002 in parent task
... BCM002 perform updates in the other tables
-- old amounts uses to call BCM002 in parent task
-- updates CDEP amounts
-- new amounts uses to call BCM002 in parent task
... LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 1 (opening)
... LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 2,3,4,5,6 (change)
... LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 2,4,6 (change)
... LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 10 (drawings)
... LCHI_TYPEOFCHANGE = 20 (releases)
